content.html: so @fastly and @github have both made announcements about funding maintainers and open source projects today. excellent news. now as an industry we just need to 1000x the amounts committed and we'd start to make a significant dent on OSS sustainability.
content.value:
so @fastly and @github have both made announcements about funding maintainers and open source projects today. excellent news. 

now as an industry we just need to 1000x the amounts committed and we'd start to make a significant dent on OSS sustainability.
